title: A true reporte of the death & martyrdome of M. Campion Iesuite and preiste, & M. Sherwin, & M. Bryan preistes, at Tiborne the first of December 1581 Observid and written by a Catholike preist, which was present therat Wheruuto [sic] is annexid certayne verses made by sundrie persons
author: Alfield, Thomas, 1552-1585.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by R. Rowlands or Verstegan,
